qa.name: Zorp
qa.appearance: Tall, slender with blue skin and large, expressive eyes

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the vastness of the cosmos, an unexpected connection formed.
json_to_edit.description: Zorp, an alien, observes and interacts with a young Earth child in a park.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Children playing, birds chirping, distant traffic
json_to_edit.name: First Contact
json_to_edit.scene_summary: An alien named Zorp learns about love and human emotions from a child in a park.

qa.action: A bustling park with children playing. Zorp's spacecraft is partially visible behind some trees.

hf.action: Zorp cautiously approaches a group of children, his large eyes filled with curiosity.

tr.action: A young child notices Zorp and stares in wonder, not fear.

xc.action: The child offers Zorp a flower, and the alien examines it with fascination.

ka.action: Zorp and the child play on a seesaw, the alien clearly enjoying this new experience.

fn.action: Zorp's eyes shine with a new understanding as the child hugs him.

af.action: As the sun begins to set, Zorp looks torn between staying and leaving.

qo.action: Zorp's spacecraft rises above the trees as the child waves goodbye, both having learned something valuable.

edit_command: Add a new shot before each existing shot, showing Zorp's internal thoughts or reactions. Don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: In the vastness of the cosmos, an unexpected connection formed.
updated_json.description: Zorp, an alien, observes and interacts with a young Earth child in a park.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Children playing, birds chirping, distant traffic
updated_json.name: First Contact
updated_json.scene_summary: An alien named Zorp learns about love and human emotions from a child in a park.

bx.action: Zorp's eyes widen with a mix of excitement and apprehension as he prepares to explore the park.

qa.action: A bustling park with children playing. Zorp's spacecraft is partially visible behind some trees.

lm.action: Zorp's face shows a blend of curiosity and nervousness as he decides to approach the children.

hf.action: Zorp cautiously approaches a group of children, his large eyes filled with curiosity.

yz.action: Zorp's eyes flicker with surprise and wonder as he notices a child looking at him without fear.

tr.action: A young child notices Zorp and stares in wonder, not fear.

wp.action: Zorp's face shows intense fascination as he prepares to examine the offered flower.

xc.action: The child offers Zorp a flower, and the alien examines it with fascination.

nt.action: Zorp's eyes sparkle with joy and anticipation as he discovers the concept of play.

ka.action: Zorp and the child play on a seesaw, the alien clearly enjoying this new experience.

ek.action: Zorp's face softens, showing a newfound warmth and understanding of human affection.

fn.action: Zorp's eyes shine with a new understanding as the child hugs him.

jh.action: Zorp's eyes reflect a mix of sadness and gratitude as he realizes it's time to leave.

af.action: As the sun begins to set, Zorp looks torn between staying and leaving.

uv.action: Zorp's eyes convey a profound sense of growth and the bittersweetness of farewell.

qo.action: Zorp's spacecraft rises above the trees as the child waves goodbye, both having learned something valuable.

label.rationale: we will add a new shot before each existing shot to show zorp's internal thoughts or reactions. this will double the number of shots from 8 to 16. we'll update the "number_of_shots" field accordingly. for each new shot, we'll create a close-up of zorp's face, revealing his thoughts or emotions related to the action in the following shot. we'll maintain the existing shot order and content while inserting these new shots. the "list_display_order" will be updated to include the new shots, and we'll assign random two-letter keys for each new shot.
